title: Spacious 1 BR available 9/9, close to shopping and Downtown SR!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Come and see what The Meadows in Santa Rosa has to offer.', 'Where our lush landscaping & serene setting creates the perfect surrounding for any lifestyle.', 'Our spacious 1 and 2 bedroom apartments have been updated with stone counter-tops and breakfast bar, mission style white kitchen and bathroom cabinets, stainless steel appliances, modern ceiling fans, vinyl planking and so much more.', 'We are near Sonoma State University, Santa Rosa Junior College, shopping, dining, parks, and Downtown.', 'Did we mention that we are Pet Friendly!', 'We accept Cats and Dogs under 25 lbs.', 'limit.', '1 pet maximum per apartment.', 'Our Professional Staff will do everything to make your living at The Meadows the "Very Best!"', 'Please contact us for a virtual tour of our Beautiful Apartments in Santa Rosa at', 'show contact info', '*We are now conducting virtual tours*', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'September 9, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Cats - allowedDogs - allowed, Max weight 25 lb each, Rent $50.00, Deposit $500.00Comments: Restricted Breeds Apply.', 'Deposit:', '$1400-$1600', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'All prices quoted are for a 12 month lease.', 'We do offer leases as short as 6 months but it will change the rental rate.', 'Contact the leasing office for more details.', 'Application fee:', '55.58', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Laundry:', 'Shared, 24 Hour Laundry Room', 'Parking type:', 'Covered', 'Parking notes:', 'Assigned parking', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Balcony/patio, Sprinkler system, Lush landscape', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Ceiling fans', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Shared pool, Barbecue', 'Security and Access:', 'Security Patrol', 'Views:', 'City', 'Additional features:', 'Vaulted ceiling, Hot tub / Spa, Non-Smoking Property, Vaulted Ceiling in select units, Stone Counter Tops', 'Offered by:', 'The Meadows', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
